original_text: He gave him the plans of all that the Spirit had put in his mind for the courts of the temple of the Lord and all the surrounding rooms, for the treasuries of the temple of God and for the treasuries for the dedicated things.
korean_text: 또 그가 영감으로 받은 모든 것 곧 여호와의 성전의 뜰과 사면의 모든 방과 하나님의 성전 곳간과 성물 곳간의 설계도를 주고

sentences.original_text: of all that the Spirit had put in his mind
sentences.korean_translation: 영이 그의 마음에 두신 모든 것의

sentences.original_text: for the courts of the temple of the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 주변 방들을 위한 것이라

sentences.original_text: for the treasuries of the temple of God
and for the treasuries for the dedicated things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 구별된 것들을 위한 보물고들을 위한 것이라
